name: servicenow
title: ServiceNow
description: Search and explore content from ServiceNow.
author: ralvarez

commands.name: history
commands.title: Text search
commands.description: Use this command to perform a search within your ServiceNow instance. Simply enter your search query, and the extension will return relevant results in real-time, allowing you to quickly find tickets, incidents, knowledge articles, and other records

commands.name: instances
commands.title: Manage instances
commands.description: Configure and manage your ServiceNow instances for use in search queries

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
